statements: UPDATE dashboard_deforestation SET deforestation_area = 200.5, location = 'Amazon' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE climate_data SET precipitation = 150.2, climate_event = 'Extreme Rainfall' WHERE month = 'June';
UPDATE deforestation_data SET deforestation_rate = 3.5, climate_impact = 'Medium' WHERE country = 'Brazil';
